fields.text: Thank you for calling Bebo, the San Francisco-based streaming app designed exclusively for Twitch Partners.
For technical support and app assistance, please press [INDEX].
For streaming quality or connectivity issues, please press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist for streaming quality and connectivity issues.
For help with app navigation and features, please press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a support agent for app navigation and feature assistance.
For partnership opportunities or account inquiries, please press [INDEX].
For partnership program details and advertising opportunities, please press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.
For account management or billing inquiries, please press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our billing and account management team.
